title: Why Polly? Part 1 - Meet the Princess
description: Fantasy... Adventure... Romance... Follow a lively young heroine into excitement and danger in this new serialized novel!Polly meets the Princess of Angaria, and gets roped into one of her schemes. But while impersonating a princess should be fun for a long-nosed and light-footed flower girl who usually spends her days at the market, it leads to more complications than she can imagine. When two strangers invade the princess's room in the middle of the night, Polly must cope with being in the wrong place at the wrong time...‘Why Polly?’ is a serialized novel which will ultimately contain thirty chapters. This is Chapter 1.
author: Harma-Mae Smit
